attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament and call an immediate General Election
attributes.additional_details:
The current political impasse cannot be allowed to continue. 
We need a functioning government, an end to uncertainty, decisions to be made, attention given to important everyday issues and an end to this National Anxiety.
This has gone on far too long.
As Parliament is unable to break the current deadlock, it must be put to the People. 
We urge MPs to immediately dissolve Parliament, call a General Election, set out your stalls in a positive way and let the People decide the way forward.
attributes.background:
This Government and Parliament are completely deadlocked, unable to function, and unwilling to find a way forward in any meaningful way. 
We believe Parliament no longer represents the wishes of the people and has no mandate to continue.
